update.description:
* You can specify a minimum version in the `CMakeLists.txt`. E.g.:

      `find_package(ignition-transport0 0.8.0 QUIET REQUIRED)`

* Tweaked `ignition-config.cmake` to export all the information about the internal dependencies. A client using our library shouldn't have to worry about protobuf, zeromq or uuid.

* Cleaned example/CMakeLists.txt

CI results:

* [Ubuntu trusty happy](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-trusty-amd64/38/).
* [Mac OS X happy](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/52/).
* [Windows happy](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-windows7-amd64/66/).

*Priority increased in preparation for the upcoming releases.*
update.title: Find_package with minimum version
